name: EUROPOLARIS European Policy Advice and Research & Innovation Strategies
goal: EUROPOLARIS provides independent strategic advice on European research and innovation policies
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Horizon Europe Framework Programme for Research and Innovation

ECSEL Joint Undertaking and the European Partnership on Key Digital Technologies as its potential successor beyond 2020

other European policies relevant for research and innovation, including general framework conditions
